Class MenuWithHandler

A simple structure describing a menu or an menu item (without the use of Windows.Forms). If ID is null, this is a main menu, if SubMenus is null, it is a simple menu item. If SubMenus is not null, this structur contains a list of submenus. This structure must be converted to a platform dependant menue and displayed accordingly.
